metadata.title: CVE-2017-15594 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.9.x allowing x86 SVM PV guest OSusers to cause a denial of service (hypervisor crash) or gain privilegesbecause IDT settings are mishandled during CPU hotplugging.

criterions.comment: xen: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
